alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 11:07PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Yuma County in northeastern Colorado, southwestern Cheyenne, western Thomas and northern Sherman Counties in northwestern Kansas through 1145 PM MDT/1245 AM CDT/... At 1107 PM MDT/1207 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 19 miles south of Eckley to near Goodland. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Goodland around 1110 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Bonny Reservoir. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 16 and 28. Highway 385 near mile marker 210, and between mile markers 212 and 241. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
